wikispeech-desc: A text-to-speech tool to make Wikimedia's projects more accessible for people that for different reasons have difficulties reading.
apihelp-wikispeech-summary: Split a page's HTML content into segments.
apihelp-wikispeech-param-page: The title of the page to segment.
apihelp-wikispeech-param-removetags:
HTML tags that should be removed completely during cleaning, as a JSON object of the format: 
{
  "tag1": true,
  "tag2": "css-class",
  "tag3": ["css-class-1", "css-class-2"]
}
where tag1 is always removed, tag2 is only removed if it also has the CSS class css-class and tag3 is only removed if it also has the CSS class css-class-1 or css-class-2.
apihelp-wikispeech-param-segmentbreaking: HTML tags that should breaks segments.
apihelp-wikispeech-example-1: Segment the main page using default parameters from the config.
apihelp-wikispeech-example-2: Segment using custom parameters. The tag sup is removed and so is div when it has the class toc. The tags h1 and h2 break segments.
apierror-wikispeech-removetagsinvalidjso: <var>removetags</var> is not a valid JSON string.
apierror-wikispeech-removetagsinvalid: removetags is not of a valid format. It must be an object with the values being booleans, strings or arrays of strings. To not remove any tags, set removetags to empty object, {}.
apihelp-wikispeechlisten-param-revision: Page revision on which the segment is found.
apihelp-wikispeechlisten-param-voice: Voice to use. If not provided the default voice for the language will be used.
apierror-wikispeechlisten-notallowed: You do not have the rights to call this API action.
apierror-wikispeechlisten-invalid-langua: $1 is not a valid language. Should be one of: $2.
apierror-wikispeechlisten-invalid-voice: $1 is not a valid voice. Should be one of: $2.
apierror-wikispeechlisten-non-latest-rev: Only latest revision of a page may be used.
apihelp-wikispeechlisten-example-3: Request a segment from a revision. Will use cached synthesis if it exists.
apierror-wikispeechlisten-invalid-input-: Input text must not exceed $1 characters, but contained $2 characters.
